snippet.title: SWIFT - TRAILER | Online Competitive Student Game (2021)
snippet.description:
Here's the trailer for our graduation project: SWIFT

SWIFT is a 3v3 multiplayer competitive game played in short matches of Capture the Flag. Players face each others in sword fights revolving around a one-shot mechanic, where precise use of your movement is key to succeed.


Twitter: https://twitter.com/SwiftTheGame
Discord: TBA
Itch.io: TBA


Team:
Alexandre Villiers Moriamé: Art Director - Concept Artist - Environment Artist
Pierre-Louis Mabire: Environment Artist - Lighting Artist - Level Artist
Antoine Destailleurs: Character Artist - Character Designer
Jules-Ismaël Tien: Game Designer - UX Designer - Sound Designer
Nils Nerson:  Level Designer - Producer - Prop Artist
Léo Marambat-Patinote: Gameplay & Network Programmer
Nicolas Ceriani: Vision Owner - VFX Artist - Gameplay Programmer - Animator
